Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Longport in 1979...
Drove in 7 runs against Capital City on 4/13/1985...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 4/22/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Pontiac on 9/13/1985...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/2/1986 to a 4-year deal worth $5,893,800 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1986, hitting .408 with 4 HR, 23 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1986, hitting .481 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1986, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1988, hitting .524 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/10/1991, off Richard Dimarco (Ash)...
